text: Strong crush the weak. That's how world works.
speaker: ogre

text: You've wasted everyone's time, including yours.
speaker: teach

text: Humans usually don't look so scared when they're asleep.
speaker: themouse

text: This place sure seems to be making you sad.
speaker: themouse

text: Why don't you leave with me? We can go find some food.
speaker: themouse

text: No, not yet. I have to get to the top.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: If I can't, I'm not allowed to go home.
speaker: zatt_despair

text: I have to be in control.
speaker: zatt_despair
